quote.text: "‘We see acting as a central activity in the understanding of life and, whether this is pursued professionally for the theatre or as a means of education, we see the central activity of acting as improvisation..."

page_text.text: John published a number of books – including, with Ernest Richards, Improvisation (published by Methuen and Co Ltd in 1966), Living Expression, also with Richards, (Ginn and Co Ltd, 1968),  Uses of Drama (Methuen and Co Ltd, 1977) and Mastering Movement: The Life and Work of Rudolf Laban (Routledge 2001).  He was researching a biography of Alan Ayckbourn when he died.
